page.title: 07SOME LOCAL SHOPS
page.content:
The Bungalow stores are owned by Mr R Small who used to be a child care assistant.The shop was built about 30 years ago and at present 5 people are {employed}there.Mr Small and his staff enjoy there work.Alot of the stock is delivered but the rest is bought from a cash and carry in{Bridgwater.}The items of stock that sell the most are Newspapers and magazines, sweets and pencils.(Our local school{children}are very keen!)
There is also a Butchers which was established in 1974.The butcher lives above the shop and has been a butcher for 35 years.The meat is bought at {markets}in Exeter and Bristol which are both about 40 miles away on the motorway.The shop opens every day,but is closed on Wednesday afternoon. The shop is open from 07.30 to 17.30.
